Call for Vigilance.name: Call for Vigilance
Call for Vigilance.flavor: An intangible field of protection unfurls around you, keeping a vigilant watch on your allies and blinding those who dare attack them.
Call for Vigilance.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you attacks one or more of your allies.
Call for Vigilance.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Call for Vigilance.effect: The target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

Righteous Disruption.name: Righteous Disruption
Righteous Disruption.flavor: A ray of scintillating light and shadow strikes your foe, disrupting its life force and leaving it at your alliesâ€™ mercy.
Righteous Disruption.effect: Your allies gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +5 power bonus to damage rolls against the target. In addition, the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls. These effects last until the end of the encounter.

Constant Vigilance.name: Constant Vigilance
Constant Vigilance.flavor: You appear at the side of a dying ally to grant the power of healing.
Constant Vigilance.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points or fewer.
Constant Vigilance.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Constant Vigilance.effect: You teleport adjacent to the target, and the target can spend a healing surge.
